00061                 public function referrers_list()
00062                 {
00063                         $conn = Db::get_connection();
00064 
00065                         if (isset($_REQUEST['g']) && !empty($_REQUEST['g']))
00066                         {
00067                                 $conn->prepare("SELECT `referrer`, COUNT(`referrer`) AS `count` " .
00068                                                 "FROM `visits` " .
00069                                                 "WHERE (`referrer` NOT LIKE 'http://{1}%' " .
00070                                                         "AND `referrer` LIKE '%{2}%' " .
00071                                                         "AND `referrer` != '') " .
00072                                                 "GROUP BY `referrer` " .
00073                                                 "ORDER BY `count` DESC " .
00074                                                 "LIMIT {3}",
00075                                                 $_SERVER['HTTP_HOST'],
00076                                                 isset($_REQUEST['f']) ? $_REQUEST['f'] : '',
00077                                                 isset($_REQUEST['l']) && is_numeric($_REQUEST['l']) ? $_REQUEST['l'] : 50);
00078                         }
00079                         else
00080                         {
00081                                 $conn->prepare("SELECT DISTINCT `id`, `date`, `referrer` " .
00082                                                 "FROM `visits` " .
00083                                                 "WHERE (`referrer` NOT LIKE 'http://{1}%' " .
00084                                                         "AND `referrer` LIKE '%{2}%' " .
00085                                                         "AND `referrer` != '') " .
00086                                                 "ORDER BY `date` DESC " .
00087                                                 "LIMIT {3}",
00088                                                 $_SERVER['HTTP_HOST'],
00089                                                 isset($_REQUEST['f']) ? $_REQUEST['f'] : '',
00090                                                 isset($_REQUEST['l']) && is_numeric($_REQUEST['l']) ? $_REQUEST['l'] : 50);
00091                         }
00092                         $conn->exec();
00093 
00094                         $this->referrers = array();
00095                         if ($conn->num_rows() > 0)
00096                         {
00097                                 while ($referrer = $conn->fetch_assoc())
00098                                 {
00099                                         $this->referrers[] = $referrer;
00100                                 }
00101                         }
00102                         $conn->free_result();
00103                         Db::close_connection($conn);
00104                         $this->render(array('layout' => FALSE));
00105                 }

00121                 public function visits_list()
00122                 {
00123                         $conn = Db::get_connection();
00124 
00125                         $conn->prepare("SELECT * " .
00126                                         "FROM `visits` " .
00127                                         "WHERE (`ip_addr` LIKE '%{1}%' " .
00128                                                 "OR `gate` LIKE '%{1}%' " .
00129                                                 "OR `referrer` LIKE '%{1}%' " .
00130                                                 "OR `user_agent` LIKE '%{1}%') " .
00131                                         "ORDER BY `date` DESC " .
00132                                         "LIMIT {2}, {3}",
00133                                         isset($_REQUEST['f']) ? $_REQUEST['f'] : '',
00134                                         isset($_REQUEST['s']) && is_numeric($_REQUEST['s']) ? $_REQUEST['s'] : 0,
00135                                         isset($_REQUEST['l']) && is_numeric($_REQUEST['l']) ? $_REQUEST['l'] : 50);
00136                         $conn->exec();
00137 
00138                         $this->visits = array();
00139                         if ($conn->num_rows() > 0)
00140                         {
00141                                 while ($item = $conn->fetch_assoc())
00142                                 {
00143                                         $this->visits[] = new Visit($item);
00144                                 }
00145                         }
00146                         $conn->free_result();
00147                         Db::close_connection($conn);
00148                         $this->render(array('layout' => FALSE));
00149                 }

00167                 public function queries_list()
00168                 {
00169                         $conn = Db::get_connection();
00170 
00171                         if (isset($_REQUEST['g']) && $_REQUEST['g'] == 'true')
00172                         {
00173                                 $conn->prepare("SELECT `referrer`, COUNT(`referrer`) AS `count` " .
00174                                                 "FROM `visits` " .
00175                                                 "WHERE (`referrer` LIKE 'http://www.google%q=%' " .
00176                                                         "OR `referrer` LIKE 'http://%yahoo.com%p=%' " .
00177                                                         "OR `referrer` LIKE 'http://search.live.com/results.aspx?q=%') " .
00178                                                 "AND `referrer` LIKE '%{1}%' " .
00179                                                 "GROUP BY `referrer` " .
00180                                                 "ORDER BY `count` DESC " .
00181                                                 "LIMIT {2}, {3}",
00182                                                 isset($_REQUEST['q']) ? $_REQUEST['q'] : '',
00183                                                 isset($_REQUEST['s']) && is_numeric($_REQUEST['s']) ? $_REQUEST['s'] : 0,
00184                                                 isset($_REQUEST['l']) && is_numeric($_REQUEST['l']) ? $_REQUEST['l'] : 50);
00185                         }
00186                         else
00187                         {
00188                                 $conn->prepare("SELECT `id`, `date`, `referrer` " .
00189                                                 "FROM `visits` " .
00190                                                 "WHERE (`referrer` LIKE 'http://www.google%q=%' " .
00191                                                         "OR `referrer` LIKE 'http://%yahoo.com%p=%' " .
00192                                                         "OR `referrer` LIKE 'http://search.live.com/results.aspx?q=%') " .
00193                                                 "AND `referrer` LIKE '%{1}%' " .
00194                                                 "ORDER BY `date` DESC " .
00195                                                 "LIMIT {2}, {3}",
00196                                                 isset($_REQUEST['q']) ? $_REQUEST['q'] : '',
00197                                                 isset($_REQUEST['s']) && is_numeric($_REQUEST['s']) ? $_REQUEST['s'] : 0,
00198                                                 isset($_REQUEST['l']) && is_numeric($_REQUEST['l']) ? $_REQUEST['l'] : 50);
00199                         }
00200                         $conn->exec();
00201 
00202                         $this->queries = array();
00203                         if ($conn->num_rows() > 0)
00204                         {
00205                                 while ($search = $conn->fetch_assoc())
00206                                 {
00207                                         preg_match("/(\&|\?)(p|q|as_q)=([^\&]+)/", $search['referrer'], $matches);
00208                                         $term = utf8_decode(urldecode($matches[3]));
00209                                         if (!empty($_REQUEST["q"]) && stristr($term, $_REQUEST["q"]) === FALSE)
00210                                         {
00211                                                 continue;
00212                                         }
00213                                         $this->queries[] = new Query(array_merge(array('term' => $term), $search));
00214                                 }
00215                         }
00216                         $conn->free_result();
00217                         Db::close_connection($conn);
00218                         $this->render(array('layout' => FALSE));
00219                 }

00235                 public function outbounds_list()
00236                 {
00237                         $conn = Db::get_connection();
00238 
00239                         if (isset($_REQUEST['g']))
00240                         {
00241                                 $conn->prepare("SELECT `url`, COUNT(`url`) AS `count` " .
00242                                                 "FROM `outbounds` " .
00243                                                 "WHERE `url` LIKE '%{1}%' " .
00244                                                 "GROUP BY `url` " .
00245                                                 "ORDER BY `count` DESC " .
00246                                                 "LIMIT {2}, {3}",
00247                                                 isset($_REQUEST['f']) ? $_REQUEST['f'] : '',
00248                                                 isset($_REQUEST['s']) && is_numeric($_REQUEST['s']) ? $_REQUEST['s'] : 0,
00249                                                 isset($_REQUEST['l']) && is_numeric($_REQUEST['l']) ? $_REQUEST['l'] : 50);
00250                         }
00251                         else
00252                         {
00253                                 $conn->prepare("SELECT `id`, `occurred_at`, `url` " .
00254                                                 "FROM `outbounds` " .
00255                                                 "WHERE `url` LIKE '%{1}%' " .
00256                                                 "ORDER BY `occurred_at` DESC " .
00257                                                 "LIMIT {2}, {3}",
00258                                                 isset($_REQUEST['f']) ? $_REQUEST['f'] : '',
00259                                                 isset($_REQUEST['s']) && is_numeric($_REQUEST['s']) ? $_REQUEST['s'] : 0,
00260                                                 isset($_REQUEST['l']) && is_numeric($_REQUEST['l']) ? $_REQUEST['l'] : 50);
00261                         }
00262                         $conn->exec();
00263 
00264                         $this->outbounds = array();
00265                         if ($conn->num_rows() > 0)
00266                         {
00267                                 while ($item = $conn->fetch_assoc())
00268                                 {
00269                                         $out = new Outbound($item);
00270                                         if (isset($item['count']))
00271                                         {
00272                                                 $out->count = $item['count'];
00273                                         }
00274                                         $this->outbounds[] = $out;
00275                                 }
00276                         }
00277                         $conn->free_result();
00278                         Db::close_connection($conn);
00279                         $this->render(array('layout' => FALSE));
00280                 }

00297                 public function hits_by_host_list()
00298                 {
00299                         $conn = Db::get_connection();
00300 
00301                         $conn->prepare("SELECT `ip_addr`, `params`, COUNT(*) AS `weight` " .
00302                                         "FROM `visits` " .
00303                                         "WHERE `gate` LIKE '%{1}%' " .
00304                                         "AND `date` >= '{2}' " .
00305                                         "AND (`ip_addr` LIKE '%{3}%' " .
00306                                         "OR `params` LIKE '%Apache'' => ''%{3}%') " .
00307                                         "AND `referrer` LIKE '%{4}%' " .
00308                                         "AND `user_agent` LIKE '%{5}%' " .
00309                                         "GROUP BY CONCAT(`ip_addr`, `user_agent`) " .
00310                                         "HAVING `weight` >= '{6}' AND `weight` <= '{7}' " .
00311                                         "ORDER BY `weight` DESC " .
00312                                         "LIMIT {8}",
00313                                         @$_REQUEST['p'],
00314                                         date("Y-m-d H:i:s", Time::ago(@$_REQUEST['t'])),
00315                                         @$_REQUEST['f'],
00316                                         @$_REQUEST['r'],
00317                                         @$_REQUEST['u'],
00318                                         @$_REQUEST['l'],
00319                                         @$_REQUEST['h'],
00320                                         9999);
00321                         $conn->exec();
00322 
00323                         $this->hosts = array();
00324                         if ($conn->num_rows() > 0)
00325                         {
00326                                 while ($line = $conn->fetch_assoc())
00327                                 {
00328                                         $host = Host::by_ip_addr($line['ip_addr'], $line['params']);
00329                                         $host->weight = $line['weight'];
00330                                         $this->hosts[] = $host;
00331                                 }
00332                         }
00333                         $conn->free_result();
00334                         Db::close_connection($conn);
00335                         $this->render(array('layout' => FALSE));
00336                 }

00342                 public function ip()
00343                 {
00344                         $visit_factory = new Visit();
00345                         $this->visits = $visit_factory->find_by_query('SELECT * ' .
00346                                 'FROM `visits` ' .
00347                                 "WHERE `ip_addr` = '{$_REQUEST['ip']}' " .
00348                                 'ORDER BY `date` DESC');
00349                         $this->render(array('layout' => FALSE));
00350                 }

00356                 public function unblock_ip()
00357                 {
00358                         if (isset($_GET['id']))
00359                         {
00360                                 $blocked_ip = new BlockedIp();
00361                                 $blocked_ip->find_by_id($_GET['id']);
00362                                 $blocked_ip->delete();
00363                                 die(l('IP address unblocked.'));
00364                         }
00365                         die(l('You must provide an id in order to unblock an IP address.'));
00366                 }
00367 
00372                 public function block_ip()
00373                 {
00374                         $blocked_ip = new BlockedIp();
00375                         $blocked_ip->ip_addr = $_REQUEST['ip'];
00376                         $blocked_ip->save();
00377                         die(sprintf(l('IP address %s correctly blocked.'), $_REQUEST['ip']));
00378                 }

00394                 public function blocked_ips_list()
00395                 {
00396                         $conn = Db::get_connection();
00397 
00398                         $bip_factory = new BlockedIp();
00399                         $this->blocked_ips = $bip_factory->find_all(array(
00400                                 'where_clause' => "`ip_addr` LIKE '%{$conn->escape(@$_REQUEST['q'])}%'",
00401                                 'order_by' => '`blocked_at` DESC'));
00402 
00403                         Db::close_connection($conn);
00404 
00405                         $this->render(array('layout' => FALSE));
00406                 }

00438                 public function attribute_visits()
00439                 {
00440                         $conn = Db::get_connection();
00441 
00442                         $visit_factory = new Visit();
00443                         $visits = $visit_factory->find_all(array('where_clause' => "`date` >= '{$conn->escape(date("Y-m-d H:i:s", Time::ago(@$_REQUEST['t'])))}' " .
00444                                         "AND (`ip_addr` = '{$conn->escape(@$_REQUEST['ip'])}' " .
00445                                         "OR `params` LIKE '%Apache'' => ''{$conn->escape(@$_REQUEST['ip'])}%')"));
00446                         if (count($visits) > 0)
00447                         {
00448                                 foreach ($visits as $visit)
00449                                 {
00450                                         $visit->person_id = @$_REQUEST['person_id'];
00451                                         $visit->save();
00452                                 }
00453                         }
00454 
00455                         Db::close_connection($conn);
00456 
00457                         $this->render(NULL);
00458                 }
00459         }
